html:
God is my salvation. Salvation is spoken of twice in this verse for emphasis. Lectures on Faith defines salvation as follows: "Salvation consists in [gaining] the glory, authority, majesty, power and dominion which Jehovah possesses and in nothing else; and no being can possess it but himself or one like him."

Lord Jehovah is my strength. God is "the Strength of Israel" (1 Sam. 15:29; 1 Ne. 21:5; 2 Ne. 22:2), a name that sets forth the Lord's ability to save Israel both temporally and spiritually.

Lord Jehovah is…my song. God is the central focus of our song and music.
